creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: Lama robe of embroidered apple green satin used in temple dances? theater?  This robe is very similar in design and technique to 42.8.125, with which compare it.  Lining of pink satin.  Inscription.  Cf. robe, fig. 38, p.87, Chinese Textiles, Priest and Simmons.
title: Theatrical Robe for a Warrior
